Isha Ambani-Anand Piramal’s Grand Wedding Invite Will Make You Wish You Were On The Guest List Too!
Isha Ambani-Anand Piramal’s Grand Wedding Invite Will Make You Wish You Were On The Guest List Too!
2018 is a year of weddings. From Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone's wedding to Nick and PC announcing that they will tie the knot, a lot of stories have found their happy ending this year. Another talked-about couple is Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal.
Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani's daughter Isha is all set to tie to knot with Anand Piramal. The couple got engaged in a grand ceremony in Lake Como, Italy. From floral bridal showers to A-listers of Bollywood attending the grand event, the engagement ceremony was no less than a grand festival in itself.
But looks like that was just the beginning of actual grand celebrations for the Ambanis and the Piramal's.
The official announcement of the same was made a few days ago that read:
"We are delighted to share that the marriage of Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal will take place in the residence of Shri Mukesh Ambani and Smt. Nita Ambani in Mumbai with family members and close friends on 12th December 2018. The ceremonies will be performed in accordance with Indian traditions, customs, and culture.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
During the weekend prior to the wedding, the Ambani and Piramal families will host their friends and family in Udaipur, where they are partnering with artisans and craftsmen to integrate local culture and traditions into the festivities. Both families seek the blessings and good wishes of everyone for Isha and Anand as they start their journey of togetherness. Nita and Mukesh Ambani Swati and Ajay Piramal.
Photo-journalist Viral Bhayani took to Instagram to give all of us a glimpse of the wedding invite. As you open the box, you hear Gayatri Mantra and the box consists of four other small boxes, probably made of gold. These boxes also have framed pictures of Goddess Gayatri.
Have a look.
Well, if you're someone who is feeling jealous that you're not on the guest list, don't worry. We all are in the same boat. Who wouldn't want to be a part of these grand celebrations after all?
(All the pictures have been sourced from Pinterest and fan-pages)
